an8.72:1.1: “Saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti, no ca silava.
an8.72:1.5: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti silava ca,
an8.72:2.1: Saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti silava ca, no ca bahussuto …pe…
an8.72:2.4: parisavacaro ca, no ca visarado parisaya dhammam deseti …pe…
an8.72:2.5: visarado ca parisaya dhammam deseti, no ca ye te santa vimokkha atikkamma rupe aruppa te kayena phusitva viharati …pe…
an8.72:2.6: ye te santa vimokkha atikkamma rupe aruppa te kayena phusitva viharati, no ca asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati;
an8.72:2.9: ‘kintaham saddho ca assam, silava ca, bahussuto ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisavacaro ca, visarado ca parisaya dhammam deseyyam, ye te santa vimokkha atikkamma rupe aruppa te kayena phusitva vihareyyam, asavananca khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
an8.72:3.1: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti, silava ca, bahussuto ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisavacaro ca, visarado ca parisaya dhammam deseti. Ye te santa vimokkha atikkamma rupe aruppa te ca kayena phusitva viharati, asavananca khaya …pe… sacchikatva upasampajja viharati;
an8.72:3.3: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, atthahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu samantapasadiko ca hoti sabbakaraparipuro ca”ti.
